name: Message Queue
description: Queue depth and message flow monitoring

pages.name: Queue Performance
pages.description: Queue depth, throughput, and consumer metrics

queries.query: SELECT latest(queue.messages.ready) AS 'Messages Ready' FROM MessageQueue WHERE entity.guid = {{ entity.guid }} SINCE 5 minutes ago

SELECT rate(sum(queue.messages.published), 1 minute) AS 'Published', rate(sum(queue.messages.delivered), 1 minute) AS 'Delivered' FROM MessageQueue WHERE entity.guid = {{ entity.guid }} TIMESERIES SINCE 1 hour ago
SELECT latest(queue.consumers) AS 'Consumers' FROM MessageQueue WHERE entity.guid = {{ entity.guid }} SINCE 5 minutes ago
SELECT latest(queue.messages.ready) AS 'Ready', latest(queue.messages.unacknowledged) AS 'Unacknowledged' FROM MessageQueue WHERE entity.guid = {{ entity.guid }} TIMESERIES SINCE 6 hours ago
SELECT average(queue.message.age) AS 'Avg Age (seconds)' FROM MessageQueue WHERE entity.guid = {{ entity.guid }} TIMESERIES SINCE 1 hour ago

SELECT latest(queue.messages.ready) AS 'Ready', latest(queue.messages.unacknowledged) AS 'Unacked', rate(sum(queue.messages.published), 1 minute) AS 'Publish Rate', rate(sum(queue.messages.delivered), 1 minute) AS 'Delivery Rate', latest(queue.memory.usage) AS 'Memory Usage' FROM MessageQueue WHERE entity.guid = {{ entity.guid }} SINCE 5 minutes ago

SELECT rate(sum(queue.messages.published), 1 minute) AS 'Inbound Rate', rate(sum(queue.messages.delivered), 1 minute) AS 'Outbound Rate', (rate(sum(queue.messages.published), 1 minute) - rate(sum(queue.messages.delivered), 1 minute)) AS 'Net Flow' FROM MessageQueue WHERE entity.guid = {{ entity.guid }} SINCE 30 minutes ago
